verses.verse: אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> Then אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Then said שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> hath said לִשְׁכּ֖וֹן <S%H7931><s%> that he would dwell בָּעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <S%H6205><s%> in the thick darkness

וַֽאֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I בָּנִ֥יתִי <S%H1129><s%> But I have built בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> an house זְבֻ֖ל <S%H2073><s%> of habitation לָ֑ךְ וּמָכ֥וֹן <S%H4349><s%> for thee and a place לְשִׁבְתְּךָ֖ <S%H3427><s%> for thy dwelling עוֹלָמִֽים׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

וַיַּסֵּ֤ב <S%H5437><s%> turned הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> his face וַיְבָ֕רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> the whole congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> and all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עוֹמֵֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> stood

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said בָּר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> [that] which he spake בְּפִ֔יו <S%H6310><s%> with his mouth אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> David אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> to my father וּבְיָדָ֥יו <S%H3027><s%> who hath with his hands מִלֵּ֖א <S%H4390><s%> fulfilled לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Since הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Since the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> i הוֹצֵ֣אתִי <S%H3318><s%> that I brought forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּי֮ <S%H5971><s%> my people מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor בָחַ֣רְתִּֽי <S%H977><s%> I chose בְעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> no city מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> among all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> in that my name שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> might be there וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor בָחַ֣רְתִּֽי <S%H977><s%> might be there neither chose בְאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> I any man לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become נָגִ֖יד <S%H5057><s%> to be a ruler עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> over my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וָאֶבְחַר֙ <S%H977><s%> But I have chosen בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> that my name שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> might be there וָאֶבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> might be there and have chosen בְּדָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> David לִהְי֖וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to be over עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> to be over my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in לְבַ֖ב <S%H3824><s%> Now it was in the heart דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> my father לִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> for the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> But the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> to David אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> my father יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H3824><s%> Forasmuch as it was in thine heart לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לִשְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> for my name הֱ‍ֽטִיב֔וֹתָ <S%H2895><s%> thou didst well כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in לְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3824><s%> in that it was in thine heart

רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> Notwithstanding אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִבְנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> thou shalt not build הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> but בִנְךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> but thy son הַיּוֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> which shall come forth מֵֽחֲלָצֶ֔יךָ <S%H2504><s%> out of thy loins הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he יִבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> he shall build הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house לִשְׁמִֽי׃ <S%H8034><s%> for my name

וַיָּ֣קֶם <S%H6965><s%> therefore hath performed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָר֖וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> that he hath spoken וָאָק֡וּם <S%H6965><s%> for I am risen up תַּחַת֩ <S%H8478><s%> the place דָּוִ֨יד <S%H1732><s%> in the room of David אָבִ֜י <S%H1><s%> my father וָאֵשֵׁ֣ב ׀ <S%H3427><s%> and am set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> on the throne יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> promised יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD וָאֶבְנֶ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> and have built הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house לְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> for the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וָאָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> have I put שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> And in it אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> There בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> wherein [is] the covenant יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> that he made עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> with the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֗ד <S%H5975><s%> And he stood לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נֶ֖גֶד <S%H5048><s%> the presence כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all קְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> in the presence of all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּפְרֹ֖שׂ <S%H6566><s%> and spread forth כַּפָּֽיו׃ <S%H3709><s%> his hands

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Now עָשָׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> had made שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <S%H8010><s%> For Solomon כִּיּ֣וֹר <S%H3595><s%> scaffold נְחֹ֗שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> a brasen וַֽיִּתְּנֵהוּ֮ <S%H5414><s%> and had set בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> it in the midst הָעֲזָרָה֒ <S%H5835><s%> of the court חָמֵ֨שׁ <S%H2568><s%> of five אַמּ֜וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits אָרְכּ֗וֹ <S%H753><s%> long וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five אַמּוֹת֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits רָחְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7341><s%> broad וְאַמּ֥וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits שָׁל֖וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three קוֹמָת֑וֹ <S%H6967><s%> high וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> and upon it he stood עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> on וַיִּבְרַ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> and kneeled down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בִּרְכָּיו֙ <S%H1290><s%> upon his knees נֶ֚גֶד <S%H5048><s%> the presence כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all קְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> before all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּפְרֹ֥שׂ <S%H6566><s%> and spread forth כַּפָּ֖יו <S%H3709><s%> his hands הַשָּׁמָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H8064><s%> toward heaven

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> And said יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there כָּמ֣וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> like אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> [there is] no God בַּשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> like thee in the heaven וּבָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> nor in the earth שֹׁמֵ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> which keepest הַבְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> covenant וְֽהַחֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> and [shewest] mercy לַעֲבָדֶ֕יךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servants הַהֹלְכִ֥ים <S%H1980><s%> that walk לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לִבָּֽם׃ <S%H3820><s%> thee with all their hearts

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who שָׁמַ֗רְתָּ <S%H8104><s%> Thou which hast kept לְעַבְדְּךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> with thy servant דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> David אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> my father אֵ֥ת <S%H854><s%> that אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> that which thou hast promised ל֑וֹ וַתְּדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> him and spakest בְּפִ֛יךָ <S%H6310><s%> with thy mouth וּבְיָדְךָ֥ <S%H3027><s%> [it] with thine hand מִלֵּ֖אתָ <S%H4390><s%> and hast fulfilled כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> is this

וְעַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> Now therefore O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שְׁ֠מֹר <S%H8104><s%> keep לְעַבְדְּךָ֨ <S%H5650><s%> with thy servant דָוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> David אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> my father אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֤רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> that which thou hast promised לּוֹ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> him saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִכָּרֵ֨ת <S%H3772><s%> There shall not fail לְךָ֥ אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> thee a man מִלְּפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> in my sight יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> to sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> upon the throne יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רַ֠ק <S%H7535><s%> yet so אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יִשְׁמְר֨וּ <S%H8104><s%> take heed בָנֶ֜יךָ <S%H1121><s%> that thy children אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכָּ֗ם <S%H1870><s%> to their way לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> as thou hast walked בְּת֣וֹרָתִ֔י <S%H8451><s%> in my law כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הָלַ֖כְתָּ <S%H1980><s%> have walked לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Now then O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יֵֽאָמֵן֙ <S%H539><s%> be verified דְּבָ֣רְךָ֔ <S%H1697><s%> let thy word אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> which thou hast spoken לְעַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servant לְדָוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> David
